definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The loan money will be used in the inner decoration.
sentences.chinese: 申請的貸款將用於室內裝潢。

sentences.english: We will need to find an interior decorating company to redo the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須找一家室內裝潢公司來整修廚房。

sentences.english: We are fascinated by the delicate interior design of the apartment.
sentences.chinese: 公寓的精緻的室內裝潢設計吸引。

sentences.english: We need to find an interior decorating company to redecorate the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要找一家室內裝潢公司來整修廚房。

sentences.english: Or how a interior designer would improve a car.
sentences.chinese: 或者，一位室內裝潢師會去如何改善一輛汽車。

sentences.english: Make a detailed constructional drawing of interior decoration, material and colors.
sentences.chinese: 繪製室內裝潢施工詳圖及材料與色彩資料。

definition: variant of 裝潢|装潢[zhuang1 huang2]
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
